code: import"./toggle.css";import React,{useContext}from'react';import sun from"../../img/sun.png";import moon from"../../img/moon.png";import{ThemeContext}from"../../context";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Toggle=function Toggle(){var handleClick=function handleClick(){theme.dispatch({type:"TOGGLE"});};var theme=useContext(ThemeContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"t",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:sun,alt:"sun",className:"t-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:moon,alt:"moon",className:"t-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"t-button",onClick:handleClick,style:{left:theme.state.darkMode?0:25}})]});};export default Toggle;
